titleStmt.title: Three hymns, by the Bishop of Bath and Wells. Author of the Manual of Prayers for the use of the schollars of Winchester Colledge.
titleStmt.author: Ken, Thomas, 1637-1711.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ch. Broome, at the Gun, at the West End of St. Paul's Church, 1700. And are to be sold by John Ramsay at the foot of his house within the foot of Con's Closs,

notesStmt.note: Bishop of Bath and Wells = Thomas Ken.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
